titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on cathode drive unit includes 89-Kilowatt Gearmotor, synchronous belt, stainless steel bearing housing, bearings, stainless steel drive shaft, cooling water lead-through, stainless steel driveflange connection, rubber seals, PEEK high performance plastic, insulators, water fittings and metric stainless steel hardware.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary:
1/29/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on cathode drive unit includes 89-Kilowatt Gearmotor, synchronous belt, stainless steel bearing housing, bearings, stainless steel drive shaft, cooling water lead-through, stainless steel driveflange connection, rubber seals, PEEK high performance plastic, insulators, water fittings and metric stainless steel hardware.
